testcase.name: Register an account with valid email and password
testcase.summary: Verify that the user can create an account.
testcase.preconditions: The https://www.sinsay.com/ro/ro/ should be open in the browser.

step.actions:
Enter a valid email and password

e.g

  • email: t760389@gmail.com
  • first name: a
  • last name: a
  • password: 123456

step.expectedresults:
An account is created.
The user is redirected to the main page.

testcase.name: Login an user using valid credentials
testcase.summary: Verify that the user can log in to the application.

step.actions:
Enter a valid email and password

e.g

  • email: test@test.ro
  • password: parola

step.expectedresults: The user is redirected to the main page.

testcase.name: Login using facebook
testcase.summary: Verify that the user can log in using Facebook.

step.expectedresults: The user is redirected to the facebook log in page.
The user is redirected to the main page.

testcase.name: Search an existing product
testcase.summary: Verify that the user receives results according to the search.

step.expectedresults: The user only receives watches as a result.

testcase.name: Add a product to the shopping bag
testcase.summary: Verify that the user can add a product to the shopping bag.

step.expectedresults: The user receives only dresses as result.

The product is added to the shopping bag.
The user receives a message with two options "Catre cos" and "Continuati cumparaturile".

testcase.name: The quantity is updated when adding the same product to shopping bag
testcase.summary: Verify that the quantity and price is updated when adding the same product to the shopping bag.
testcase.preconditions: " Rochie mini cu snur decorativ " color "galben" and size "XS" is already in the shopping bag.

step.expectedresults: The user receives only dresses.

step.actions: Click on " Rochie mini cu snur decorativ "

step.expectedresults:
The quatity and price is updated.

The user receives a message with two options "Catre cos" and "Continuati cumparaturile".

testcase.name: A new entry is added to the shopping bag when the size and color are different
testcase.summary: Verify that when adding the same product with a different size and color a new entry is added to the shopping cart

step.expectedresults: The user receives only dresses.

step.actions: Click on " Rochie mini cu snur decorativ "

step.expectedresults:
A new line is added in the shopping bag.
The price is updated.

The user receives a message with two options "Catre cos" and "Continuati cumparaturile".

testcase.name: A product is deleted when clicking on "trash" button
testcase.summary: Verify that a product is deleted when clicking on "trash bin" button from shopping bag.
testcase.preconditions: " Rochie mini cu snur decorativ " color "galben" size "XS" is already in the shopping bag.

step.expectedresults: The product is deleted from shopping bag.

testcase.name: Add a valid discount coupon
testcase.summary: Verify if the user can add a valid discount coupon.
testcase.preconditions:
The user is logged in with:

  • email: t760389@gmail.com
  • password: 123456

"Rochie mini cu snur decorativ" color "albastru-pal" and size "XXS" is already in the shopping bag.

step.expectedresults: The price is updated.

testcase.name: Order a product with cash on delivery
testcase.summary: Verify if the user can succesfully order a product
testcase.preconditions:
The user is logged in with:

  • email: t760389@gmail.com
  • password: 123456

"Rochie mini cu snur decorativ" color "albastru-pal" and size "XXS" is already in the shopping bag.

step.actions:
Select "Plata la livrare" with:

  • first name: a
  • last name: a
  • postal code: 1234
  • city: iasi

step.expectedresults: A message "Comanda a fost plasata" appears.

testcase.name: Order a product with online pay
testcase.summary: Verify if the use can succesfully order an product with online pay.
testcase.preconditions:
The user is logged in with:

  • email: t760389@gmail.com
  • password: 123456

"Rochie mini cu snur decorativ" color "albastru-pal" and size "XXS" is already in the shopping bag.

step.actions: Select the shipping method e.g Ridicare din magazin
Select the desired shop e.g "Șoseaua București-Ploiești Km. 20 077015 Balotești" and click on "Alege"
step.expectedresults: A modal/dialog with client details appears.

step.actions:
Enter the client details

e.g

  • first name: a
  • last name: a
  • phone: 123456789

step.expectedresults: The user is redirected to the bank app to confirm the payment.

testcase.name: User profile update
testcase.summary: Verify if the user can update the information in their profile.

step.expectedresults: The profile information is succesfully updated and displayed correctly in the user's account.

testcase.name: Loggout from account
testcase.summary: Verify if the user can log out from their account.

step.expectedresults: The user is logged out from the account and redirected to the main page.

testcase.name: Register an account with invalid email and password
testcase.summary: Verify if an user can register using invalid credentials.

step.actions: Hover the mouse on "Cont" and click on "Inregistreaza-te"

Enter invalid credentials

e.g

  • email: testtest.com
  • first name: a12
  • last name: a12
  • password: 1

step.expectedresults: A message "Contul nu poate fi creat. Caractere invalide" appears.

testcase.name: Login an user with invalid email and password
testcase.summary: Verify if the user can login using invalid credentials.

step.actions: Hover the mouse on "Cont" and click on "Conecteaza-te"

step.expectedresults: A message "Acest cont nu exista" appears.

testcase.name: Login an user with a valid email and an invalid password
testcase.summary: Verify if an user can login with an invalid password.

step.actions: Hover the mouse on "Cont" and click on "Conecteaza-te"

step.expectedresults: A message "Logare sau parolă nevalidă." appears.

testcase.name: Verify forgot password functionality
testcase.summary: Verify if the user can request and receives a valid password reset link in case of a forgotten password.

step.actions: Hover the mouse on "Cont" and click on "Conecteaza-te"

step.expectedresults: A modal/dialog appears.
The user receives an e-mail with a link to change the password.

testcase.name: Change the language
testcase.summary: Verify if the user can change the language.

step.expectedresults: The user is redirected to the main page for changing the country.

testcase.name: Search a non-existing product
testcase.summary: Verify if the user is gettimg results for a non-existing product

step.expectedresults: A message "Niciun rezultat" appears.

testcase.name: Product details
testcase.summary: Verify that the product details page displays accurate information about a selected product.

step.actions: Navigate to a product category e.g Femei - Rochii
Click on a specific product to view its details e.g "Rochie mini cu model"
step.expectedresults: The product details page shows the product's name, description, price and images.

testcase.name: Add an invalid discount coupon
testcase.summary: Verify if the user can use an invalid coupon.
testcase.preconditions:
The user is logged in with:

  • email: t760389@gmail.com
  • password: 123456

"Rochie mini cu snur decorativ" color "albastru-pal" and size "XXS" is already in the shopping bag.

step.expectedresults: A message "Cuponul introdus este invalid" appears.

testcase.name: Visualization of Orders
testcase.summary: Verify the functionality of visualizing the user's orders.
testcase.preconditions:
1. The user is logged, e.g

  • email: t760389@gmail.com
  • password: 123456

2. At least one order must be placed and recorded in the user's account.

step.expectedresults: The orders are displayed from the mosdt recent to the oldest.

testcase.name: Filter a dress by size
testcase.summary: Verify if the user can filter a dress by size.

step.expectedresults: Only dresses with size L appears.

testcase.name: Filter a dress by color
testcase.summary: Verify if the user can filter a dress by color.

step.expectedresults: Only "negru", "roz" , "crem" , "maro" , "alb" colors are displayed.

testcase.name: Filter a dress by price
testcase.summary: Verify if the user can effectively set a specific price range.

step.expectedresults: The user receives dresses betwen 30-60 range.

testcase.name: Filter a dress by length
testcase.summary: Verify if the user can filter a dress by length.

step.expectedresults: Only "maxi" length appears.

testcase.name: Filter a dress by type
testcase.summary: Verify if the user can search a dress using "croi" filtering.

step.expectedresults: Only dresses with "croi mulat" type appears.

testcase.name: Sort a product in ascending order
testcase.summary: Verify if the user can sort a product in ascending order.

step.expectedresults: The dresses are sorted in ascending order.

testcase.name: Sort a product in descending order
testcase.summary: Verify if the user can sort a product in descending order.

step.expectedresults: The dresses are sorted in descending order.

testcase.name: Newsletter subscription and notification reception
testcase.summary: Verify the functionality of newsletter subscription and notification reception.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Access to the Sinsay website
  2. A valid email address for subscription

step.actions: On the main page, scroll to the bottom of the page

step.expectedresults:
A message "V-ati abonat cu success" appears.

The user receives a confirmation message on the e-mail address.

testcase.name: Security and Privacy
testcase.summary: Verify that the user data is handled securely and privately.

step.actions: Scroll to the bottom of the page and click on "Politica de confidentialitate"
Check if the website uses HTTPS to encrypt data transmision
Review the privacy policy to ensure proper handling of user data
step.expectedresults: The website is using HTTPS and the privacy policy comply with data protection regulations.

testcase.name: Mobile responsiveness
testcase.summary: Verify that the website is responsive and displays correctly on various mobile devices.

step.actions:
Access the Sinsay website on different mobile devices e.g

  • Galaxy Note 20 Android 11
  • iPad, iPadOs 14.7.1
  • iphone 12/13 mini, iOS 14.6
step.expectedresults: The website is adapting to different screen sizes and maintain proper functionality and layouts.

testcase.name: Browser compatibility
testcase.summary: Verify if the website opens on Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge and Mozilla Firefox.

step.actions: Launch Google Chrome and navigate to the website URL e.g https://www.sinsay.com/ro/ro/
Verify that the website loads the main page correctly
Close Google Chrome and repeat step 1 for Microsoft Edge and Mozilla Firefox
step.expectedresults: The website loads correctly.
